Main Script¶

main.py¶

The core module of the Lap Simulator

lapsim.main.main()¶

The core code of the Lap Simulator

Reads inputs from the inputs.txt file and runs the simulation based off of those parameters. If some paramters are missing it fills them with defualt values.

Creates an output.txt file containing information about the simulation based on the passed inputs, including individual lap information as well as overall time, speed, and length of the race.
